google_reviews.review: Had mice come in my dorm in stack 3, however the schools exterminator quickly solved this problem. Other dorms seem to be more run down with old carpet and loose kitchen cabinets. Not to bad for first apartment style housing though.

google_reviews.author: Crystal Schmalz
google_reviews.review: This is campus housing for WWU. It is all 2bdrm apartments, that are set up to housing 4 students (2 per room). It works out to being about $350 a month & you don't need a meal plan!! It has a full dinningroom & kitchen with a gas stove, double sink with gatbage disposal. A large living room, storage closet & food pantry. There is free on-site laundry as well!

google_reviews.author: Elizabeth
google_reviews.review: These apartments are great when it comes to the price but currently there is limited parking due to construction. If you're looking for an affordable option as a student at Western Washington University I suggest it.

summary.text:
Good

Birnam Wood Apartments receive praise from several residents particularly for its affordability and proximity to Western Washington University, making it an appealing option for students seeking cost-effective living quarters. The living spaces, while not luxurious, are considered functional for the price point. Moreover, the user reviews cite the benefit of having amenities such as on-site laundry facilities, which add to the convenience for residents.

With certain apartments set up to accommodate multiple students, the cost-effective aspect is further highlighted by mentions of full kitchens with gas stoves and the lack of a need for a meal plan. Comments about the community events also suggest an attempt at fostering a communal atmosphere, which can be beneficial for student residents looking for a sense of unity with their peers.

Great

A handful of reviews specifically highlight standout features such as spacious living rooms, ample storage space, and enjoyable balconies. The lovely outdoor spaces appear to be a redeeming quality of these apartments. Additionally, some users express satisfaction with the maintenance of the facilities, hinting at an attentive property management team that periodically addresses issues to ensure functional living conditions.

Positive reviews also commend the cost-effectiveness of Birnam Wood Apartments when compared to other housing options in Bellingham. This is particularly appreciated by students and young individuals seeking an affordable living space near campus, which comes with the added benefit of circumventing the need for an expensive meal plan, as there are complete dining and kitchen areas available inside the apartments.

Bad

Despite some good aspects, user reviews also shed light on numerous maintenance issues that prospective tenants might face. Residents have reported delays in response times to maintenance requests, with one having to wait a month for the hot water issue to be addressed. The condition of the apartments at move-in is frequently criticized, with mentions of things needing immediate maintenance and reports of issues such as flickering lights, indicating a lack of attentiveness to the property over time.

Another recurring concern involves the general state of repair within the units. User reviews describe aspects of the living space as outdated, from the carpets stained upon arrival to kitchen cabinets that are falling apart. The complaints suggest a need for renovations or at least more thorough maintenance between tenants to improve the overall quality of the living experience at Birnam Wood Apartments.

Ugly

The more severe criticisms pertain to living conditions that potentially compromise the well-being and comfort of the tenants. Residents have encountered significant issues such as pest infestations, with one review citing a problem with mice, and heating systems that are either stuck on high or fail to operate as temperatures drop. Such complaints underscore a perceived negligence in addressing fundamental aspects of a comfortable and safe living environment. Furthermore, the lack of timely and efficient resolutions to serious maintenance requests might indicate an underlying issue with the property management's processes or priorities.
